product_name: Sprigs Mesh Phone Banjee Wrist Wallet - 2013 Overstock
long_description: The Sprigs Mesh Phone Banjee Wrist Wallet is the extra pocket you wish you had. It holds your smartphone and has see-through mesh so you can view texts, answer your calls and choose music on the go. Zippered pocket is sized to fit your smartphone and provides enough storage for a key, cash and credit card. Fabric stretches, allowing it to slide over your hand onto your wrist. Overstock.
